p: Results: Human skin allografts were obtained from multi organ and tissue donors after both brain and cardiac death. During these nine years, 84 deceased donor skin allograft donations were performed. A significant improvement of numbers of skin procurement was observed from 2011 after the introduction of intensive care physicians as surgical team (Fig.Â 107). Quality and quantity of human skin allografts procured by intensivists were comparable to those procured by plastic surgeons.
